columns.name: EdgeLabel
columns.description: The edge label like "routes traffic to"

columns.name: SourceNodeId
columns.description: Node ID of the edge's source

columns.name: SourceNodeCategories
columns.description: Categories list of the source node in JSON format

columns.name: TargetNodeId
columns.description: Node ID of the edge's target

columns.name: TargetNodeName
columns.description: Display name of the target node

columns.name: TargetNodeCategories
columns.description: The categories list of the target node in JSON format

columns.name: EdgeProperties
columns.description: Optional data relevant for the relationship between the nodes in JSON format
